infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Blip needs permission to access your microphone in order to record audio through the app.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: In order to select an image to upload, Blip needs access to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: In order to select an image to upload, Blip needs access to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
